ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] all I can say is hmmmm
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, you re more of an addict than me, care to add up your playtimes for our amusement :P /tease I think they really are trying to go out of their way and
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, you're more of an addict than me, care to add up your playtimes for our
amusement :P
/tease

I think they really are trying to go out of their way and compromise on a
few things that they have high customer demand for. If they dont, we'll all
start wanting to play AO.

Halana/Tani

> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 09, 2001 12:15 PM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] all I can say is hmmmm
>
>
> When Verant does a 180 on a position that was once supposedly
> "carved in
> stone" - you gotta bet that there is a great deal of demand from the
> customer base motivating them. Or maybe just a new, "kinder, gentler"
> management team - who knows!
>
> Personally, I think it is a great idea. I have 4 accounts
> and 2 PC's. If I
> am not driving 2 char's, I actually feel like something is
> missing and I do
> spend most of my time in 6 person groups doing exp or events.
> At times, I
> have really wished that certain characters were on other
> accounts for ease
> of teleporting. My "mains" are 60 Bard, 60 Cleric, 52
> Enchanter, and 51
> Wizard. The wizard account happens to have a rogue that I
> would like to
> level up sometime in the near future and teleports are
> obviously not as
> convenient as they could be. So this is a good thing for me.
> Btw, I am
> actually thinking of getting a 3rd PC - probably not for
> playing 3 at the
> same time - except for teleporting and maybe powerleveling.
>
> As far as unsavory characters inflicting pain and suffering
> on unsuspecting
> groups, we already have plenty of that. It's called "A normal day in
> Sebilis." If they transfer to a new server, they should be
> pretty easy to
> spot. They will be wearing that new kind of armor: Emperor Armor*
>
> Sylly Songsynger
> newly minted Virtuoso
> <this space for rent>
> Somewhere on Innoruuk....
>
> * do you mean to say that you have not seen the Emperor's new
> armor? ;)
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 09, 2001 11:30 AM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] all I can say is hmmmm
>
>
> I'm not sure if it is funny or sad. I do hope we don't
> suddenly see a bunch
> of characters who couldn't get in a group on their old server
> due to their
> unsavory ways suddenly dropped on unsuspecting high level
> groups elsewhere.
>
> Kitasi
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to
> http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>
